title: NOT ABLE TO LAUNCH THE CLIENT!
body:
Hi, i am not able to launch the client. When i press the launch button, the image of league disappairs, and that's it. When i look at the task manager, there are no traces of anything that has to do with leauge. I have read that an antivirus software could be the program causing these problems, but i don't even have a software of this kind.

I have tried running as admin, reinstalling and repairing the client. 

Are there anybody out there that could take a minute and help me fix this?

replies.body: It doesn't sound like any antivirus is blocking League, but you might actually be onto something with that assumption. When a program opens and closes quickly like that it's typically caused by your OS missing permissions for that program. Hit up our [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) for steps on how you can set those up properly, but definitely, let me know if that doesn't help.
I'm having this problem as well, i've seen multiple people with this problem, yet no solutions. I've tried running as admin, nothing.
